item.description:
The follow-up for this amazing juice fasting program after 2 weeks of body purification!

 

What You’ll Experience in the follow-up class:

  • Slow and vigorous Qi Gong movements that will get anyone's heart                         pumping, burn excessive body mass and release stagnant energy from the body
  • Abdominal massage for better digestion and Relaxation
  • Healthy food break accompanied with a healthy dish/juice recipe (you will participate in juice making)
  • Learn how to finish your fasting without creating too much stress for your body


Can wait to see the brave members who attended the Introduction class earlier and were willing to reboot their system with juices!
item.how_to_find_us: Private home in two family house close to Washington Park
item.name: Detoxify Your Body with Juice Fasting-Follow-up!
